response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. This item holds immense value for us and we believe it could be an exceptional addition to your collection. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we're offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. We're confident this price reflects both the quality of the product and the opportunity it presents. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14000}
